name: UnrealscriptAuxiliaryToolkit
summary: Tools for unrealscript creation and organization for the Unreal Engine
short_description:
A set of tools for aid in development of unrealscript code for Unreal technology. The tools aim at avoiding searching through the numerous file by providing easy access to the hierarchy of the classes, locating variables across multiple files, and other tasks such as automation of the addition of folders to the compilation list.
The tools are offered in command line for free, while there may also be a paid GUI version in the future ,as well as a Visual Studio plugin for free use.
